findings.title: Unprotected constructor
findings.description: The constructor of a contract is unprotected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially modify the contract's state.

findings.title: Reentrancy in transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected functions
findings.description: The increaseAllowance, div, mul, sub, add, abs, totalSupply, balanceOf, allowance, transfer, approve, transferFrom, and other functions are unprotected.

findings.title: Lack of access control
findings.description: The functions setInitialDistributionFinished, setFeeExempt, setSwapBackSettings, setFeeReceivers, setMinReferralAmountActivated, clearStuckBalance, rescueToken, setRebaseFrequency, setRewardYield, setBuyFees, setSellFees, setReferralFeeWithReferral, setTransferFee, setIsLiquidityInBnb, setNextRebase, setMaxSellTransaction, setReferralCA, setMaxWalletExempt, setTimeF, setIsAllowedToRebase, setMaxWalletDenom, and setMaxSellTransactionDenom do not have proper access control.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Apy Bank's smart contracts have active ownership which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.

findings.title: Rebase functionality
findings.description: The smart contract utilizes rebase functionality to adjust circulating token supply according to a token's price fluctuations, controlled by minter.

findings.title: Blacklist functionality
findings.description: stops specified wallets from interacting with the smart contract function modules

findings.title: Airdrop functionality
findings.description: The Airdrop functionality allows executing transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address.

findings.title: Max transaction and max wallet limitations
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max sell transaction limit and max wallet denominators to reduce honeypot risk.

findings.title: Fee collection from swap events and/or transfer events
findings.description: executes fee collection from swap events and/or transfer events

findings.title: Functionality to limit the number of transactions that a wallet can make within 24-hours
findings.description: The smart contract has functionality to limit the number of transactions that a wallet can make within 24-hours.
